data.price: Bemeramana! Ni ukuri umuhagarikizi n’umutabazi wanyu, ni Imana Allah n’Intumwa yayo, hamwe rero n’abemeramana; barya batsimbataza isengesho rikwije ibisabwa ku mwanya waryo, bakanatanga n’ishikanwa-bwirizwa bicishije bugufi ku Mana Allah.
data.arabic: إِنَّمَا وَلِيُّكُمُ ٱللَّهُ وَرَسُولُهُۥ وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ ٱلَّذِينَ يُقِيمُونَ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَيُؤۡتُونَ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ وَهُمۡ رَٰكِعُونَ

data.price: Uwo wese rero azogira Imana Allah Umuhagarikizi, agaheza akizera Imana Allah n’Intumwa yayo hamwe n’abemeramana, azoba ari mu mugwi uharanira Imana Allah. Burya mu vy’ukuri, umugwi uharanira Imana Allah, ni wo wenintsinzi.
data.arabic: وَمَن يَتَوَلَّ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ فَإِنَّ حِزۡبَ ٱللَّهِ هُمُ ٱلۡغَٰلِبُونَ

dua.name: Ayat al-Wilayah
dua.significanceReason: Describes true believers and divine guardianship, specifically highlighting the status of those who support Allah's cause.
